description:
Tama is nine-years-old, the youngest of the Yagami sisters, and is in third grade. In contrast of http://anidb.net/ch47888 [Tsurugi], despite Tama`s young age, she has the appearance of an adult woman. However, she has the innocent personality of a girl her age or even younger.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Yagami Tama
